alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 8:32PM AKST until March 06 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Near Atigun Pass. * WHEN...6 AM to 6 PM Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North winds gusting to 40 mph will develop in Atigun Pass early Sunday and continue into Sunday afternoon. This will cause blowing and drifting snow with low visibility. The winds and blowing snow will taper off Sunday evening. These conditions are only expected from Atigun Pass to Chandalar Shelf. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
